section.title: Alert notification rulesAE_notifications_home_page
section.para: You can receive automated email notifications when alerts are triggered by a preconfigured alert notification rule. The rule specifies the conditions that trigger a particular alert, as when the number of events exceeds the threshold limit associated with the rule.
The Notification Rules page displays a list of preconfigured alert notification rules.

listitem.para: An alert is triggered whenever several security incidents are detected for a specific user and indicate a pattern of high-risk behavior, whether intentional or unintentional.
